Robert A. Iger.title: Chief Executive Officer
Robert A. Iger.bio: Robert A. Iger is the Chief Executive Officer of The Walt Disney Company. He previously served as Executive Chairman from 2020 to 2022, and as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer from 2005 to 2020.

Hugh F. Johnston.title: Chief Financial Officer
Hugh F. Johnston.bio: Hugh F. Johnston is the Chief Financial Officer of The Walt Disney Company, overseeing the company's worldwide finance organization, including controllership, tax, treasury, corporate strategy and business development, investor relations, and enterprise controllership.

Christine M. McCarthy.title: Chief Operating Officer
Christine M. McCarthy.bio: Christine M. McCarthy is the Chief Operating Officer of The Walt Disney Company, responsible for the company's operations across all business segments.

Horacio Gutierrez.title: Chief Corporate Affairs Officer & Chief Legal Officer
Horacio Gutierrez.bio: Horacio Gutierrez serves as both Chief Legal Officer and Chief Corporate Affairs Officer, overseeing government relations, corporate communications, corporate social responsibility, and all legal matters for the company.

Sonia Coleman.title: Chief Human Resources Officer
Sonia Coleman.bio: Sonia Coleman is the Chief Human Resources Officer of The Walt Disney Company, responsible for all aspects of human resources management.

Rebecca Campbell.title: Chief Content Officer
Rebecca Campbell.bio: Rebecca Campbell is the Chief Content Officer of The Walt Disney Company, responsible for content strategy and operations across all platforms.

Josh D'Amaro.title: Chairman, Disney Parks, Experiences and Products
Josh D'Amaro.bio: Josh D'Amaro leads Disney's theme parks, resorts, cruise line, and consumer products businesses worldwide.

Alannah Hall-Smith.title: EVP-Communications & Public Affairs
Alannah Hall-Smith.bio: Alannah Hall-Smith leads communications and public affairs for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Bruce E Vaughn.title: President & Chief Creative Officer
Bruce E Vaughn.bio: Bruce E Vaughn serves as President & Chief Creative Officer for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Douglas Leckie.title: EVP - Chief Digital & Technology Officer
Douglas Leckie.bio: Douglas Leckie leads digital and technology initiatives for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Jeffrey N Vahle.title: President Walt Disney World Resort
Jeffrey N Vahle.bio: Jeff Vahle serves as President of Walt Disney World Resort, overseeing all operations of the world's largest theme park resort.

Jill Estorino.title: Pres & Managing Dir, Disney Parks Intl
Jill Estorino.bio: Jill Estorino leads Disney Parks International, overseeing international theme park operations.

Joseph F Schott.title: President Disney Signature Experiences
Joseph F Schott.bio: Joe Schott leads Disney Signature Experiences, including Disney Cruise Line and Disney Vacation Club.

Barry Compagnoni.title: VP-Safety, Compliance & Med Ops
Barry Compagnoni.bio: Barry Compagnoni oversees safety, compliance, and medical operations for Disney Signature Experiences.

Brian Ruppe.title: Director, Quality & Process Improvement
Brian Ruppe.bio: Brian Ruppe is Director of Quality & Process Improvement for Disney Signature Experiences.

Claire L Bilby.title: SVP & GM-DSE Emerging Businesses
Claire L Bilby.bio: Claire L Bilby is SVP & GM of DSE Emerging Businesses.

Joseph Rand (Joe).title: SVP - Commercial Strategy
Joseph Rand (Joe).bio: Joseph Rand (Joe) is SVP of Commercial Strategy for Disney Signature Experiences.

Carrine Matson (Carrie).title: VP-Marketing & Distribution Strategy
Carrine Matson (Carrie).bio: Carrine Matson (Carrie) is VP of Marketing & Distribution Strategy.

Jay S Roesch.title: VP-Pricing, Revenue Management, Deployment & Itinerary Planning
Jay S Roesch.bio: Jay S Roesch is VP of Pricing, Revenue Management, Deployment & Itinerary Planning.

Kim A Engilis.title: Admin Assistant
Kim A Engilis.bio: Kim A Engilis is Admin Assistant to Joseph Rand (Joe).

Maria D Fabregat.title: VP-Customer & Trade Experience
Maria D Fabregat.bio: Maria D Fabregat is VP of Customer & Trade Experience.

Tina Erlhoff.title: Dir, Product Strategy & Planning
Tina Erlhoff.bio: Tina Erlhoff is Director of Product Strategy & Planning.

Bobby A Filipski.title: Mgr Pricing & Promotions DVC
Bobby A Filipski.bio: Bobby A Filipski is Manager of Pricing & Promotions DVC.

Bridgette E Lahens.title: Sr Mgr-Revenue Mgmt
Bridgette E Lahens.bio: Bridgette E Lahens is Senior Manager of Revenue Management.

Dan C Burklew.title: Exec Director, Pricing & Revenue Management DCL
Dan C Burklew.bio: Dan C Burklew is Executive Director of Pricing & Revenue Management DCL.

Harold Quesada.title: Sr Mgr Deployment Planning & Strategy
Harold Quesada.bio: Harold Quesada is Senior Manager of Deployment Planning & Strategy.

Jared Wacksman.title: Mgr-Pricing Strategy & Integration DVC
Jared Wacksman.bio: Jared Wacksman is Manager of Pricing Strategy & Integration DVC.

Kayla L Aplin.title: Pricing & Revenue Mgmt Mgr A&E
Kayla L Aplin.bio: Kayla L Aplin is Pricing & Revenue Management Manager A&E.

LORENA HICKS.title: Pricing & Revenue Mgmt Mgr A&E
LORENA HICKS.bio: LORENA HICKS is Pricing & Revenue Management Manager A&E.

Martha A Rule.title: Admin Assistant
Martha A Rule.bio: Martha A Rule is Admin Assistant to Jay S Roesch.

Sharon D Siskie.title: SVP & GM, Disney Cruise Line
Sharon D Siskie.bio: Sharon D Siskie is SVP & GM of Disney Cruise Line.

Stephanie W Young.title: President, Disney Vacation Club, Adventures & Expeditions, and Disney Institute
Stephanie W Young.bio: Stephanie W Young is President of Disney Vacation Club, Adventures & Expeditions, and Disney Institute.

Judy Terry.title: Sr. Exec Assistant â€“ Office of the Chairman, Disney Experiences
Judy Terry.bio: Judy Terry serves as Senior Executive Assistant in the Office of the Chairman for Disney Experiences.

Kenneth M Potrock.title: President, TWDC Major Events Integration
Kenneth M Potrock.bio: Ken Potrock leads major events integration for The Walt Disney Company.

Kevin A Lansberry.title: EVP & CFO
Kevin A Lansberry.bio: Kevin Lansberry serves as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Lisa S Becket.title: EVP-Global Marketing
Lisa S Becket.bio: Lisa Becket leads global marketing for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Tami L Garcia.title: EVP-Human Resources
Tami L Garcia.bio: Tami Garcia leads human resources for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Tasia Filippatos.title: President CPGP (DIESI)
Tasia Filippatos.bio: Tasia Filippatos leads Consumer Products, Games and Publishing for Disney Parks, Experiences and Products.

Thomas Mazloum.title: President Disneyland Resort
Thomas Mazloum.bio: Thomas Mazloum serves as President of Disneyland Resort, overseeing all operations of the original Disney theme park resort.
